name: Silverstripe-restfulapi
tagline: SilverStripe 3 RESTful API with a default JSON serializer.
body:
# Welcome
Welcome to the unofficial Silverstripe RESTful API website! Here you can find extra Documentation and tutorials for the [silverstripe-restfulapi module created by colymba](https://github.com/colymba/silverstripe-restfulapi).So what are you waiting for? [Go learn some stuff!](https://mooror.github.io/silverstripe-restfulapi/website/documentation/index.html)

# Description
This module implements a RESTful API for read/write access to your SilverStripe Models. It comes bundled with a default Token Authenticator, Query Handler and JSON Serializers, and can be extended to your need and to return XML or other content type via custom components.

# Disclaimer
Though I do manage this project website and a fork of the silverstripe-restfulapi repository, I am not in fact the original creator nor am I apart of the organization/team that created it. The purpose of this site is to give extra information (like [API Docs](https://mooror.github.io/silverstripe-restfulapi/website/)) and tutorials that were not included in the original project. So please make sure to go and support the [official github repository for this project](https://github.com/colymba/silverstripe-restfulapi)
